last_episode_to_air.name: The Treasure
last_episode_to_air.overview: As doubt looms over Miguel, Wilson encourages him to continue the adventure. But is discovering the treasure truly written in the stars?

name: Bandidos
overview: A gang of skilled misfits ventures to uncover a long-hidden Mayan treasure. Their strategy? Hazy. Their dynamic? Off. Luckily, they're pretty ingenious.
tagline: A Mayan treasure never seen before... until now.

episodes.name: The Map
episodes.overview: Miguel stumbles into an old flame at the hotel, then meets a guest with a peculiar last name — and even stranger tattoo — who ignites his dreams of gold.

episodes.name: The Sacred Place
episodes.overview: As their plan goes awry, the gang pivots to help Miguel. With the cops hot on their trail, Miguel and Wilson enlist a new member and dash to the cenote.

episodes.name: The Stone
episodes.overview: With Miguel facing a dismaying fate, Lucas's gadgets come in handy, as does Lilí's idea — still, they're bound for an explosive confrontation.

episodes.name: The Legend of the Three Keys
episodes.overview: After Lilí saves the day, the gang considers splitting, but a dire threat binds them back together. Juan offers a cryptic, yet monumental clue.

episodes.name: The Exchange
episodes.overview: The bandits hit their next target: Churches. With time running out, they decide to divide and conquer... but outsmarting their pursuers won't be easy.

episodes.name: The Traitor
episodes.overview: After their stunt is stalled, the group must figure out if there's a traitor among them. Soon, more than one revelation comes to light.

episodes.name: The Treasure
episodes.overview: As doubt looms over Miguel, Wilson encourages him to continue the adventure. But is discovering the treasure truly written in the stars?
